name: ict/ictech-backend-login-by-otp
description: After installing this plugin, both administrators and users with different roles can log in to the backend by receiving an OTP via email.

description.en-GB: After installing this plugin, both administrators and users with different roles can log in to the backend by receiving an OTP via email.
